entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `OrderedSet<T>` #110882
    Future

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] xcode15+ linker issue #97745
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonUnmappedMemberHandling.DisallowExceptTypeDiscriminator #110466

PullRequests

Updated

  • Do not encode safe points with -1 offset. #110845
    area-VM-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: split loop headers that are also try entries #110880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GetNormalizedLength on iOS and similar platforms #110723
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix HostActivation.Tests unknown-rid #110687
    area-HostModel, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
